text: Hello! I am trying to get my modules to group together more closely, but I'm not quite sure how to do this in my design manager. I have noticed in my rolling modules that they are appearing cut off or sized poorly in mobile responsive mode.
Is there anyone that might be able to point  me in the right direction? Kind regards, Kara

i donâ€™t know this is best way but I am doing similar as <@U7V9DQ31P>, make one drag and drop template and built custom modules and for some complex requirement we use hubDb.

so our marketing team became happy with client as well, because he also change some background colors, setup column on left or right based on their need and much more.

we try to built our layout as possible as non developer friendly. :slightly_smiling_face:
